title: @ RIOT Tantram --- TEAM NAME report
body:
So lately when I see a team name that is offensive and feel its bad ENOUGH that it warrants changing, I report them.
Currently though, the only way to report is under the Summoner Name.
Could you please add another report category in the post game feature. for group, clan, team (whatever you want to call them) names that is separate from the Summoner Name report?

replies.body:
Good idea. 

It's something we are aware of. For now, the best way is to report the name to player support.
So, stop reporting them in post game under the summoner name in the mean time?
You can keep reporting them under summoner name, but be sure to leave a comment that you are reporting a tag, and what the tag is.

Okay got it. That is what I have been doing. Thanks for the response.
I do not want to seem thrilled about a report feature, but I will definitely be relieved when tag reporting has its own separate spot.

Also, no need to respond anymore at this point.

However,
Just a side note. 
I have been playing this game since not long after its release, and I have had to report maybe 2 screen names. But since the release of Tags this feels like a once a week thing. I do not want to speculate or anything as to the reason this is.

But I feel if there were a reward/punishment program attached to them, it might help reduce these inflammatory tag names.

Reward ex 1: if you have more than ten players in your group who have each been in the group for ten days or more, then you get a unique loading banner around your summoner card (like the projects) (it could be a rainbow border or something signifying diverse clan player) 
Reward ex 2: 25 members, you get to change your tag for free up to 1 time.
Reward ex 3: 50 members, you get to change your tag for free up to 3 times and your clan gets a unique ward they can use in game.
Punishment ex: Players who create Inflammatory tag names, can not create or join other clans and receive a chat restriction.
